name: Cashier Chaos
description:
Cashier Chaos.

Note: Please download the game if the webGL does not work correctly.

Cashier Chaos, the game where you play as a cashier working in a weird supermarket that drives you crazy.  How long can you last before you go insane?

This game was made in 3 days for the 7th JTA game jam.

The requirement was to make a game using the tutorial about sanity system. In this game you slowly lose sanity until you go insane and quit your job. Successfully scanning barcodes will make you regain some of your sanity.

The theme was "Strength in numbers." so I implemented this theme literally, and if you correctly enter the numers into the pin pad, you get strength. Strength lets you regain sanity easier.

This game was only made in 3 days as I started working on it late, I ran out of time near the end which is why its a bit rough around the edges. 

I hope you enjoy the game!
